directions: 1. Make waffles according to recipe, cooling waffles on a wire rack.
2. Spread one waffles with 1 tablespoon of cream cheese, and another with 1 teaspoon of preserves.
ingredients: 1 batch whole wheat pancake and waffle mix
1/2 cup cream cheese, whipped or softened
title: Strawberry Cream Cheese Waffle Sandwiches
